mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DELIVERY (waybill_number, memo, create_time, status, status_update_time, delivery_policy_id, delivery_driver_id) VALUES (#{waybillNumber}, #{memo}, #{createTime}, #{status}, #{statusUpdateTime}, #{deliveryPolicyId}, #{deliveryDriverId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, waybill_number, memo, status, create_time, update_time, status_update_time, delivery_policy_id FROM DELIVERY WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, waybill_number, memo, status, create_time, update_time, status_update_time, delivery_policy_id FROM DELIVERY ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}
mapper.update: UPDATE DELIVERY SET waybill_number = #{waybillNumber}, memo = #{memo}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, status = #{status}, status_update_time = #{statusUpdateTime}, delivery_policy_id = #{deliveryPolicyId}, delivery_driver_id = #{deliveryDriverId} WHERE id = #{id}
